divs: Sighting DetailsWhile filling car at gas station on Broadview Rd., north of Brookpark Rd a spherical red orange object passed overhead. The gas station manager saw it, a pilot and another witness. The object was coming from the north and heading southwest. A few minutes later a second object passed overhead. They looked like they were on fire.
trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Cleveland
There were no other sightings in Cleveland on or around September 29th 2009
Summary: Red Orange Balls Looked Like They Were On Fire
